nodes.text: All Dating Sites should include Background Checks
Personal data would be vulnerable to cyber attacks. Dating sites are not known for their cyber security.
Adding security helps weed out married or separated men or women.
More success percentage in relationships ending up in marriages.
Paid sites should add background checks since they're requiring a fee for using their services.
Free Sites should be optional. Enter on your own risk
Free sites won't effectively create a standard protocol for dating networks.
It will discourage criminals and catfishers to attack lonely people seeking companionship
Paid sites could increase their membership prices
There'could be a small percentage that it will end in loss of revenue on their dating sites.
Some interested users will likely not want to submit to a background check simply to go on a date.
